edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.pam
Interface PamNode

All Superinterfaces:
Activatible, LearnableActivatible, Linkable, Node, PamLinkable
All Known Implementing Classes:
PamNodeImpl
public interface PamNode
extends Node, LearnableActivatible, PamLinkable

A PamNode extends nodes. The added functionalities are mainly due to the fact that PamNodes are involved in activation passing where Nodes are not.

Author:
Ryan J McCall, Javier Snaider
